Expected number of successes = (number of draws) * (number of successes in the population) / (total population size)

So, in this case:

Number of draws = 6

Number of successes in the population (oranges) = 18

Total population size = 54

Therefore, Expected number of oranges = 6 * 18 / 54 = 6 * 18 / 54 = 6 * (18/54) = 6 * (1/3) = 2
